options: To reduce the time to access frequently used data
questions.answer: To reduce the time to access frequently used data

questions.question: Which memory type is used in USB drives?
What is the primary function of a memory management unit (MMU)?
options: To translate virtual addresses to physical addresses
questions.answer: To translate virtual addresses to physical addresses

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of volatile memory?
What is the main disadvantage of virtual memory?
Which memory type is used to store bootstrap loader?
What is the purpose of memory swapping in an operating system?
options: To move inactive pages from RAM to secondary storage
questions.answer: To move inactive pages from RAM to secondary storage

questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of registers?
What is the main difference between NAND and NOR flash memory?
options: NAND is volatile, NOR is non-volatile
NAND is faster for reading, NOR for writing
NAND has higher density and lower cost
questions.answer: NAND has higher density and lower cost

questions.question: Which memory type is used to store temporary variables during program execution?
What is the purpose of a memory protection unit?
options: To prevent unauthorized access to memory
questions.answer: To prevent unauthorized access to memory

questions.question: Which of the following is a type of secondary memory?
What is the main advantage of ROM over RAM?
Which memory type is used to store data in a computer's motherboard?
What is the primary function of a memory cache hit?
options: To indicate data is found in cache
questions.answer: To indicate data is found in cache
